704436f-b.text:
Franklin Avenue, east from near Kent Avenue. The curve in the
trolley tracks is at Franklin Street.
View 3 shows an ornsmental building, adjoining the northeast
corner of Kent Avenue.
P. L. Sperr  Au~ust 24, 1941
NO RIPPODUCTIONS  Views 1-3
704436f-b.folder: Franklin Avenue & Kent Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
